code: import React from"react";import{Bar,Doughnut,Line,Pie,Polar,Radar}from"react-chartjs-2";import{Card,CardBody,CardColumns,CardHeader}from"reactstrap";var Charts=function Charts(_ref){var match=_ref.match;var radar={labels:["Percent Difference","Kill","Time Play"],datasets:[{label:"Blue team",backgroundColor:"rgba(30, 144, 255, .2)",borderColor:"rgba(30, 144, 255, 1)",pointBackgroundColor:"rgba(30, 144, 255, 1)",pointBorderColor:"#fff",pointHoverBackgroundColor:"#fff",pointHoverBorderColor:"rgba(30, 144, 255, 1)",data:[match.blueKill/match.redKill*10,match.blueKill,match.timeToPlay]},{label:"Red team",backgroundColor:"rgba(255, 48, 48,0.2)",borderColor:"rgba(255, 48, 48,1)",pointBackgroundColor:"rgba(255, 48, 48,1)",pointBorderColor:"#fff",pointHoverBackgroundColor:"#fff",pointHoverBorderColor:"rgba(255, 48, 48,1)",data:[match.redKill/match.blueKill*10,match.redKill,match.timeToPlay]}]};return React.createElement("div",{className:"chart-wrapper"},React.createElement(Radar,{data:radar}));};export default Charts;
